name: The Recipy
description:
YOU PLAY AS A CHEF OR AS A DETECTIVE, IF YOU ARE THE CHEF STOP THE DETEVTIVE BY SHUTTING DOWN THE ELECTRICITY,OR IF YOU ARE THE DETECTIVE WIN BY UPLODING THE INFORMATION.HOW TO PLAYE HERE =>

USE WASD USE S TO SHOOT, AND UPARROW DOWNARROW LEFTARROW RIGHTARROW DOWNARROW TO SHOOT.
